div.p: Bird sampling design used to analyze edge responses: three transects were simultaneously covered by three observers within three habitat types, forest (dark gray), edge and open habitat (light gray), defining six habitat strips along the forest‐edge‐open habitat gradient: Interior Forest ( IF); Exterior Forest ( EF); Interior (forest) Edge ( IE), Exterior (open‐habitat) Edge ( EE), Interior Open habitat ( IO) and Exterior Open habitat ( EO).
